extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void checkForDataProviders(SCUIContext context, org.w3c.dom.Element apiInput, org.w3c.dom.Element apiOutput)
      This method checks if data providers are registered for any of the xpath that can be formed with the API output element context apiInput is the API input element apiOutput is the API output element
      static void invokeAdditionalDataProviders(SCUIContext context, org.w3c.dom.Element additionalDataProvidersElement, org.w3c.dom.Element apiInputEle, org.w3c.dom.Element apiOutputEle) 
      static void invokeAdditionalDataProviders(java.lang.String xpath, SCUIContext context, org.w3c.dom.Element apiInputEle, org.w3c.dom.Element apiOutputEle, org.w3c.dom.Element interestingElement)
      This method invokes the data provider registered for the xpath's found in the API output element passed xpath is the xml path of the root element for which data providers have to be looked for.
      static void loadAdditionalDataProvidersXML(java.lang.String xmlPath, javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
      This method has to be called when an additional data providers xml has to be registered.
